Retry-After.description: The Retry-After header can indicate how long the client should wait before polling the operation status.

parameters.name: properties
parameters.description: The resource properties to be updated.

post.description: The ProviderLevelAction POST call to invoke and fetch the approval request.

ApprovalRequestCredentialsSetting.description: Settings of the requested verifiable credentials in the approvals service.

approver.description: The requested verifiable credentials for approvers.

admin.description: The requested verifiable credentials for admins.

device.description: The requested verifiable credentials for devices.

approverManagementPortal.description: The requested verifiable credentials for the approver management portal.

ApprovalRequestCredentialsSettingUpdate.description: Settings of the requested verifiable credentials in the approvals service.

approver.description: The requested verifiable credentials for approvers.

admin.description: The requested verifiable credentials for admins.

device.description: The requested verifiable credentials for devices.

approverManagementPortal.description: The requested verifiable credentials for the approver management portal.

ApprovalRequestInput.description: The input for the invokeAndFetchApprovalRequest POST call.

changeStateId.description: The ARM resource ID of the ChangeState resource that the approval request is associated with.

stageProgression.description: The name of the current stage progression of the ChangeState resource.

resourceId.description: The resource that the approval request is associated with, if multiple resources are included in the ChangeState.

ApprovalRequestOutput.description: The output for the invokeAndFetchApprovalRequest POST call.

approvalRequestState.description: The current state of the approval request.

approvalToken.description: The approval token of the approval request.

ApprovalRule.description: Rule rule about the stages, approvers and their orders for the approval workflow.

stages.description: The definitions of all the stages in the approval workflow.

timeoutInMinutes.description: The maximum time in minutes that the approval workflow can be executed. The min value is 1 minute. The max value is 90 days. The default value is 7 days in the backend service.

ApprovalRuleUpdate.description: Rule rule about the stages, approvers and their orders for the approval workflow.

stages.description: The definitions of all the stages in the approval workflow.

timeoutInMinutes.description: The maximum time in minutes that the approval workflow can be executed. The min value is 1 minute. The max value is 90 days. The default value is 7 days in the backend service.

properties.description: The resource-specific properties for this resource.

eTag.description: If eTag is provided in the response body, it may also be provided as a header per the normal etag convention.  Entity tags are used for comparing two or more entities from the same requested resource. HTTP/1.1 uses entity tags in the etag (section 14.19), If-Match (section 14.24), If-None-Match (section 14.26), and If-Range (section 14.27) header fields.

ApprovalSettingListResult.description: The response of a ApprovalSetting list operation.

value.description: The ApprovalSetting items on this page

nextLink.description: The link to the next page of items

ApprovalSettingProperties.description: RP-specific properties of an ApprovalSetting resource.

provisioningState.description: The status of the last operation.

requestedCredentialsSetting.description: The settings of the requested verifiable credentials in the approvals service.

secureLedgerSetting.description: The settings of backend storage for approval service to use as a ledger.

ApprovalSettingPropertiesUpdate.description: RP-specific properties of an ApprovalSetting resource.

requestedCredentialsSetting.description: The settings of the requested verifiable credentials in the approvals service.

properties.description: The resource-specific properties for this resource.

ApprovalStage.description: Definition of an stage in an approval workflow.

name.description: The name of the stage, unique within a single approval workflow definition.

dependsOn.description: The logic rules about how the stage depends on other stages, representing as a JSON object.

approvers.description: The list of identifiers of approvers in the stage.

quorum.description: The minimal number of approvals required to complete the stage. The default value '1' means at least one approval is needed.

ApprovalStageExecutionInput.description: Input for starting execution of a stage in an approval workflow instance.

ApprovalStageExecutionState.description: Enum of state of a stage in an approval workflow instance.

values.name: Created
values.description: The initial state of the approval stage.

values.name: Started
values.description: The stage is ready to accept signoffs.

values.name: Approved
values.description: The stage has finished with approved result.

values.name: Rejected
values.description: The stage has ended with rejected result.

ApprovalStageExecutionStatus.description: Execution status of a stage in an approval workflow instance.

state.description: The latest execution state of the stage.

signoffs.description: The approvers' sign-off statuses for the stage.

properties.description: The resource-specific properties for this resource.

eTag.description: If eTag is provided in the response body, it may also be provided as a header per the normal etag convention.  Entity tags are used for comparing two or more entities from the same requested resource. HTTP/1.1 uses entity tags in the etag (section 14.19), If-Match (section 14.24), If-None-Match (section 14.26), and If-Range (section 14.27) header fields.

provisioningState.description: The status of the last operation.

scope.description: The hierarchical scope at which the approval workflow is assigned.

approvalWorkflowDefinitionId.description: The ARM resource id of the ApprovalWorkflowDefinition associated with this assignment.

logicAppRef.description: The reference to a custom Logic App.

approvalRule.description: The rule about the stages, approvers and their orders for the approval workflow.

scope.description: The hierarchical scope under which this approval workflow is assignable.

properties.description: The resource-specific properties for this resource.

ApprovalWorkflowExecutionState.description: Enum of the overall execution state of an approval workflow instance.

values.name: InProgress
values.description: The approval workflow instance is in progress.

values.name: Approved
values.description: The approval workflow instance has finished with all approval rules satisfied.

values.name: Rejected
values.description: The approval workflow instance has ended without approval rules satisfied.

values.name: Timedout
values.description: The approval workflow instance has been timed out.

values.name: Faulted
values.description: The approval workflow instance has been faulted.

properties.description: The resource-specific properties for this resource.

eTag.description: If eTag is provided in the response body, it may also be provided as a header per the normal etag convention.  Entity tags are used for comparing two or more entities from the same requested resource. HTTP/1.1 uses entity tags in the etag (section 14.19), If-Match (section 14.24), If-None-Match (section 14.26), and If-Range (section 14.27) header fields.

ApprovalWorkflowInstanceListResult.description: The response of a ApprovalWorkflowInstance list operation.

value.description: The ApprovalWorkflowInstance items on this page

nextLink.description: The link to the next page of items

ApprovalWorkflowInstanceProperties.description: RP-specific properties of an ApprovalWorkflowInstance resource

provisioningState.description: The status of the last operation.

requestedBy.description: The one who attempted to make the change for approvals.

requestedFor.description: The ARM resource id of the change that the approval workflow instance was associated with. For example, the change state resource.

changeManifest.description: The change manifest associated with the approval workflow instance, free-formed and could be a serialized json string.

approvalRuleSnapshot.description: The snapshot of the approval rule of the parent ApprovalWorkflowDefinition resource at the time the approval workflow instance was created.

executionState.description: The latest execution state of the approval workflow instance.

stageStatuses.description: The latest status of each stage.

values.name: NotStarted
values.description: The approver has not yet being asked to take an action.

values.name: Pending
values.description: The approver has not taken an action.

approver.description: The identifier of the person who takes the sign-off action.

signoffAction.description: The action the approver has taken.

signoffDateTime.description: The datetime when the approver took the sign-off action.

LogicAppRef.description: Reference to a Logic App resource.

workflowUrl.description: The workflow URL of the Logic App.

LogicAppRefUpdate.description: Reference to a Logic App resource.

workflowUrl.description: The workflow URL of the Logic App.

SecureLedgerSetting.description: Settings of backend storage for approval service to use as a ledger.

regions.description: The regions the storage should be created at and replicated to.

name.description: The name of the verification authority.

apiEndpoint.description: The API endpoint of the verification authority.

requestedCredential.description: The requested verifiable credentials for the verification authority.

secureLedgerStorageType.description: Enum of the backend storage types for approval service to use as a ledger.
